mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLI_CLIENT_SOURCE ( id, code, lastUpdateDate, name, valid, createDate, modifyAble, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{name}, #{valid}, #{createDate}, #{modifyAble}, #{remark} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM CLI_CLIENT_SOURCE WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE CLI_CLIENT_SOURCE
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
createDate = #{createDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
modifyAble = #{modifyAble,javaType=boolean},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
